6 // Code is based on the OpenCV-Example "SURF_FLANN_matching_homography_Demo.cpp"

28 bool gui;
29 ros::Publisher stopPublisher;
30 ros::Publisher lanePublisher;
31 ros::Publisher speedPublisher;
32 
38 float areaQuadrangle(std::vector<Point2f> corners){
39  float area = 0;
40 
41  area = 0.5 * ( corners[0].x * corners[1].y - corners[0].y * corners[1].x
42  + corners[1].x * corners[2].y - corners[1].y * corners[2].x
43  + corners[2].x * corners[3].y - corners[2].y * corners[3].x
44  + corners[3].x * corners[0].y - corners[3].y * corners[0].x);
45  return area;
46 }
47 
55 bool signFound(float area, std::vector<Point2f> corners){
56  if(area <= 20 || area >= 290000)
57  return false;
58  if( corners[1].x - corners[0].x < 10 || corners[2].x - corners[3].x < 10 ||
59  corners[2].y - corners[1].y < 10 || corners[3].y - corners[0].y < 10 )
60  return false;
61  else return true;
62 }
63 
69 float distanceSign(float area){
70  float distance = 385 * std::pow(area, -0.6385);
71  return distance;
72 }
73 
84 void imageCallback(const sensor_msgs::ImageConstPtr& msg, int argc, char * argv[], std::vector<Mat> schilder, std::vector<int> detect_thresh)
85 {
86  //-- Loading kinect image (Resolution: 960x540)
87  cv::Mat image = cv_bridge::toCvShare(msg, "bgr8")->image;
88  cv::Mat imageGrey;
89  cv::cvtColor(image, imageGrey, CV_BGR2GRAY);
90  cv::waitKey(10);
91  Mat img_scene = imageGrey;
92 
93  //-- Check if kinect image is found
94  if ( img_scene.empty() )
95  ROS_ERROR("Could not find kinect image");
96 
97 
98  //-- Step 1a: Detect the keypoints, in the camera image, using SURF Detector, compute the descriptors
99  int minHessian = 400;
100  Ptr<SURF> detector = SURF::create( minHessian );
101 
102  std::vector<KeyPoint> keypoints_scene;
103 
104  Mat descriptors_scene;
105 
106  detector->detectAndCompute( img_scene, noArray(), keypoints_scene, descriptors_scene );
107 
108  //-- For each sign, check if it is found in the scene.
109  // i=0 -> stop sign i=1 -> Change lane sign i=2 -> Speed limit sign
110  for( int i = 0; i < detect_thresh.size(); i++){
111 
112  //-- Skip if sign referene image is not found
113  if(schilder[i].empty()){
114  continue;
115  }
116 
117  //-- Step 1b: Detect the keypoints, in the road signs, using SURF Detector, compute the descriptors
118  Mat img_object = schilder[i];
119  std::vector<KeyPoint> keypoints_object;
120  Mat descriptors_object;
121  detector->detectAndCompute( img_object, noArray(), keypoints_object, descriptors_object );
122 
123 
124  //-- Step 2: Matching descriptor vectors with a FLANN based matcher
125  // Since SURF is a floating-point descriptor NORM_L2 (Euclidian Distance) is used
126  Ptr<DescriptorMatcher> matcher = DescriptorMatcher::create(DescriptorMatcher::FLANNBASED);
127  std::vector< std::vector<DMatch> > knn_matches;
128  matcher->knnMatch( descriptors_object, descriptors_scene, knn_matches, 2 );
129 
130  //-- Step 3: Filter matches using the Lowe's ratio test
131  const float ratio_thresh = 0.75f;
132  std::vector<DMatch> good_matches;
133  for (size_t i = 0; i < knn_matches.size(); i++)
134  {
135  if (knn_matches[i][0].distance < ratio_thresh * knn_matches[i][1].distance)
136  {
137  good_matches.push_back(knn_matches[i][0]);
138  }
139  }
140 
141 
142  //-- Draw matches
143  Mat img_matches;
144  drawMatches( img_object, keypoints_object, img_scene, keypoints_scene, good_matches, img_matches, Scalar::all(-1),
145  Scalar::all(-1), std::vector<char>(), DrawMatchesFlags::NOT_DRAW_SINGLE_POINTS );
146 
147  //-- Localize the object
148  std::vector<Point2f> obj;
149  std::vector<Point2f> scene;
150 
151  for( size_t i = 0; i < good_matches.size(); i++ )
152  {
153  //-- Get the keypoints from the good matches
154  obj.push_back( keypoints_object[ good_matches[i].queryIdx ].pt );
155  scene.push_back( keypoints_scene[ good_matches[i].trainIdx ].pt );
156  }
157 
158  Mat H;
159 
160  //-- Continue only if enough key point matches have been found.
161  // Threshold values are defined individually for each sign in detect_thresh
162  if((int)good_matches.size() > detect_thresh[i]){
163  H = findHomography( obj, scene, RANSAC );
164  }
165 
166  if (! H.empty()){
167 
168  //-- Get the corners from the image_1 ( the object to be "detected" )
169  std::vector<Point2f> obj_corners(4);
170  obj_corners[0] = Point2f(0, 0);
171  obj_corners[1] = Point2f( (float)img_object.cols, 0 );
172  obj_corners[2] = Point2f( (float)img_object.cols, (float)img_object.rows );
173  obj_corners[3] = Point2f( 0, (float)img_object.rows );
174  std::vector<Point2f> scene_corners(4);
175 
176 
177  perspectiveTransform( obj_corners, scene_corners, H);
178 
179  float sign_area = areaQuadrangle(scene_corners);
180  float sign_distance = distanceSign(sign_area);
181 
182  //-- Continue only if a road sign is found
183  if(signFound(sign_area, scene_corners)){
184 
185  ROS_INFO("Object %i found! position:(%i,%i);(%i,%i);(%i,%i);(%i,%i) area:%i distance:%.2fm #keypoints=%i",i,
186  (int)scene_corners[0].x , (int)scene_corners[0].y ,
187  (int)scene_corners[1].x , (int)scene_corners[1].y ,
188  (int)scene_corners[2].x , (int)scene_corners[2].y ,
189  (int)scene_corners[3].x , (int)scene_corners[3].y ,
190  (int)sign_area, sign_distance, (int)good_matches.size());
191 
192  //-- Publish distance to rostopics
193  std_msgs::Int32 distance;
194  distance.data = (int)(sign_distance*100);
195  if (i == 0) {
196  stopPublisher.publish(distance);
197  } else if (i == 1) {
198  lanePublisher.publish(distance);
199  } else if (i == 2) {
200  speedPublisher.publish(distance);
201  }
202 
203 
204  if(gui){
205 
206  //-- Draw circles around the 4 corners
207  cv::circle( img_matches, scene_corners[0] + Point2f((float)img_object.cols), 5, Scalar(255, 0, 0), 2 );
208  cv::circle( img_matches, scene_corners[1] + Point2f((float)img_object.cols), 5, Scalar(255, 0, 0), 2 );
209  cv::circle( img_matches, scene_corners[2] + Point2f((float)img_object.cols), 5, Scalar(255, 0, 0), 2 );
210  cv::circle( img_matches, scene_corners[3] + Point2f((float)img_object.cols), 5, Scalar(255, 0, 0), 2 );
211 
212  //-- Draw lines between the corners (the mapped object in the scene - image_2 )
213  line( img_matches, scene_corners[0] + Point2f((float)img_object.cols, 0),
214  scene_corners[1] + Point2f((float)img_object.cols, 0), Scalar(0, 255, 0), 4 );
215  line( img_matches, scene_corners[1] + Point2f((float)img_object.cols, 0),
216  scene_corners[2] + Point2f((float)img_object.cols, 0), Scalar( 0, 255, 0), 4 );
217  line( img_matches, scene_corners[2] + Point2f((float)img_object.cols, 0),
218  scene_corners[3] + Point2f((float)img_object.cols, 0), Scalar( 0, 255, 0), 4 );
219  line( img_matches, scene_corners[3] + Point2f((float)img_object.cols, 0),
220  scene_corners[0] + Point2f((float)img_object.cols, 0), Scalar( 0, 255, 0), 4 );
221  }
222  }
223  }
224 
225  if (gui){
226  //-- Show detected matches
227 
228  if(i==0)
229  imshow("Schildererkennung Stop", img_matches );
230  if(i==1)
231  imshow("Schildererkennung Lane", img_matches );
232  if(i==2)
233  imshow("Schildererkennung Speed", img_matches );
234  }
235  }
236 }

242 int main( int argc, char* argv[] )
243 {
244  // init this node
245  ros::init(argc, argv, "sign_detection_node");
246 
247  // get ros node handle
248  ros::NodeHandle nh;
249 
250  //-- Topics to publish if signs found
251  stopPublisher =
252  nh.advertise<std_msgs::Int32>("/sign_detection_node/StopSign", 1);
253  lanePublisher =
254  nh.advertise<std_msgs::Int32>("/sign_detection_node/LaneSign", 1);
255  speedPublisher =
256  nh.advertise<std_msgs::Int32>("/sign_detection_node/SpeedSign", 1);
257 
258 
259  ROS_INFO("Node starting ...");
260 
261 
262  //-- The GUI can be turned on and off with the ROS-Parameter 'gui'
263  if(nh.hasParam("sign_detection_node/gui")){
264  ROS_INFO("gui parameter found");
265  }
266  else ROS_INFO("gui parameter not found");
267 
268  nh.param("sign_detection_node/gui", gui, true);
269 
270  ROS_INFO("gui=%d", gui);
271 
272  //-- Load reference road signs as greyscale
273  // index 0 -> Stop sign
274  // index 1 -> Change lane sign
275  // indey 2 -> Speed limit sign
276  std::vector<Mat> schilder(3);
277  ROS_INFO("Loading reference road signs ...");
278  schilder[0] = imread( "/home/pses/catkin_ws/src/pses_sign_recognition/data/objs/stop.png", IMREAD_GRAYSCALE);
279  schilder[1] = imread( "/home/pses/catkin_ws/src/pses_sign_recognition/data/objs/change_lane.png", IMREAD_GRAYSCALE);
280  schilder[2] = imread( "/home/pses/catkin_ws/src/pses_sign_recognition/data/objs/50.png", IMREAD_GRAYSCALE);
281 
282  for(int i = 0; i < schilder.size(); i++){
283  if(schilder[i].empty())
284  ROS_WARN("Schild %i konnte nicht geladen werden", i);
285  }
286 
287  //-- Threshold value for each sign of how many matches it counts as detected.
288  std::vector<int> detect_thresh = {25, 13, 30};
289 
290 
291  ROS_INFO("Waiting for kinect picture ...");
292 
293  ros::Subscriber imageSub = nh.subscribe<sensor_msgs::Image>(
294  "kinect2/qhd/image_color", 1, boost::bind(imageCallback, _1, argc, argv, schilder, detect_thresh));
295 
296  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
297 
298  while (ros::ok())
299  {
300 
301  // clear input/output buffers
302  ros::spinOnce();
303  // this is needed to ensure a const. loop rate
304  loop_rate.sleep();
305  }
306 
307  ROS_INFO("After loop");
308 
309  return 1;
310  ros::spin();
311 
312 }
